divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside with my cat looking at the stars in my backyard, then suddenly i noticed a strange triangle shaped object, And at first it was like a static noise, But then green and blue flashing lights came out around it, it just hoverd in the same spot then circled my area, My cat starting to look around and her eyes glowed green for some reason, They changed back to dark after that and its interior started to glow orange and i heard a roaring type noise and it suddenly disapeared leaving a blue trail that dissapeard a few minutes later
Summary: green glowing lights and an orange glow with a roar
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kearns
There were no other sightings in Kearns on or around March 13th 2012
